ctf.infosecinstitute.com: Level 5

Bounty: $50 Description:

Write-up

Upon loading the web page, we get a JavaScript loop with alert event. Instead I used curl to view the site. The source contained a link to an image. Downloading the image and running Steganography tool steghide I was able to extract text file all.txt. The file contained representation of binary data. Upon converting the binary digits to ascii we get the flag.

bash $ steghide extract -sf aliens.jpg Enter passphrase: wrote extracted data to "all.txt". $ cat all.txt 01101001011011100110011001101111011100110110010101100011010111110110011001101100011000010110011101101001011100110101111101110011011101000110010101100111011000010110110001101001011001010110111001110011 $ python >>> import binascii >>> n = int('01101001011011100110011001101111011100110110010101100011010111110110011001101100011000010110011101101001011100110101111101110011011101000110010101100111011000010110110001101001011001010110111001110011', 2) >>> binascii.unhexlify('%x' % n) 'infosec_flagis_stegaliens' >>> ## Links * http://ctf.infosecinstitute.com/levelfive.php
